name: Mandora
description:
===========

More than seven million downloads worldwide

Your devices deserve a lovely and challenging game like Mandora!

Included in What's New and Featured on iTunes in over 65 countries

Over 100,000 five-star reviews from users around the globe

===========

Prepare to be enchanted by Mandora!

Welcome to Moonycat Village, the mages' favorite farming spot and the only place on the planet where Mandora seeds can be found.

Mandoras are not just powerful magic ingredients. These creatures, which blur the lines between animal and plant, magic and science, are cultivated by Moonycat villagers, becoming fashion accessories or pets for mages. In a few years, hundreds of species became popular in the world of witchcraft.

--Fight your Facebook friends in Survival mode--

In the newly created Survival mode, not only does the difficulty increase as the game progresses, but Mandows have also been added that eat Mandora leaves, preventing the harvest. Collecting Gold Leaves gives you a chance to obtain magic items to survive as long as possible in the Forest.

--Have fun harvesting in Endless mode--

Play as a farmer responsible for harvesting mature Mandoras. Collect as many Mandoras as you can within the time limit to score points. Successful combos can also generate bonus time items and rare Mandoras for you to harvest.

--A lovely Game Diary--

Harvested Mandoras are recorded in the Journal, an album with hand-drawn art and sound effects for the player's delight. Do you have species missing from your collection? The Diary also provides tips!

--Challenge yourself--

Players are ranked each time based on the game's scoring system. Can you reach the highest position in the game?

Resources:

  • Dazzling and challenging, using countless items to compete with Facebook friends for high scores and the top rank in Survival mode

  • Simple and action-packed gameplay in Endless mode

  • Over 55 species of adorable Mandoras for you to harvest

  • Diary with hand-drawn art — a gallery of your Mandoras collection

  • Cultivation stats — personal statistics and records

  • Interactive tutorial — new players learn to play with ease

  • 60+ rankings based on your performance

  • Global leaderboard support for Game Center and individual players

  • Support for English, Chinese, Japanese, Korean, French, Portuguese and Spanish

  • Discover new surprises by playing at different times of the day
